'MethodTemplateName=VBMain; Dim inn As Innovator = Me.getInnovator() Dim res As Item
' called onAfterAdd/Update of realtionships: ' Function Main() As Item 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break() Dim thisSubFolderRel As Item = Me.newItem(Me.GetType(),"get") thisSubFolderRel.setID(Me.getID()) thisSubFolderRel.setAttribute("select","team_id,source_id(team_id,config_id,name),related_id(team_id,config_id,keyed_name,allow_team_change_logic)") thisSubFolderRel.setAttribute("serverEvents","0") thisSubFolderRel = thisSubFolderRel.apply()
If thisSubFolderRel.isError() Then Return thisSubFolderRel
Dim parentFolderTeamId As String = thisSubFolderRel.getPropertyItem("source_id").getProperty("team_id","")
Dim relItemId As String = thisSubFolderRel.getProperty("related_id","") If (relItemId <> "") Then Dim relShipTeamId As String = thisSubFolderRel.getProperty("team_id","") Dim relItemTeamId As String = thisSubFolderRel.getPropertyItem("related_id").getProperty("team_id","empty") Dim relItemType As String = thisSubFolderRel.getPropertyItem("related_id").getAttribute("type","") Dim relItemAllowTeamChange As Boolean = (thisSubFolderRel.getPropertyItem("related_id").getProperty("allow_team_change_logic","0") = "1")
If relItemAllowTeamChange And parentFolderTeamId <> relItemTeamId Then End If
' also set team id on the relionship item (since this is not controlled by 'SrcAcess' core logic If parentFolderTeamId <> relShipTeamId Then res = updateTeamIdOnItem(Me.GetType(),Me.getID(),parentFolderTeamId) If res.isError() Then Return res End If ' set team id on the related item If relItemAllowTeamChange And parentFolderTeamId <> relItemTeamId Then res = updateTeamIdOnItem(relItemType,relItemId,parentFolderTeamId) If res.isError() Then Return res End If
End If
Return Me End Function
'----------------------------- Private Function updateTeamIdOnItem (relItemType As String, relItemId As String, newTeamId As String) As Item Dim typeTable As String = relItemType.Replace(" " ,"_")
'link teamId to project space If newTeamId <> "" Then Dim SQLstr As String = "UPDATE [" & typeTable & "]" SQLstr = SQLstr & " SET [" & typeTable & "].team_id='" & newTeamId & "'" SQLstr = SQLstr & " WHERE [" & typeTable & "].id='" & relItemId & "'" res = inn.applySQL(SQLstr) Return res End If Return Me End Function
